name: 306project-g4
description: Module 306 - SensorHub project for classroom monitoring

scripts.dev: echo 'Run individual dev servers: cd code/front && npm run dev (port 3000) and cd code/back && npm run dev (port 3000 as API)'
scripts.build: npm --prefix code/front run build && npm --prefix code/back run build
scripts.vercel-build: npm install --prefix code/front && npm install --prefix code/back && npm --prefix code/front run build && npm --prefix code/back run vercel-build

author: EMF CFC Apprentices
